title: riqo
author: riqo
created_time: November 19, 2022, 03:01:04 PMLast edit: November 22, 2022, 12:54:06 PM by riqo

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Clarify me this: what's a "crypto engineer"? A cryptography expert, or a software engineer with expertise in cryptocurrency projects?Quote from: riqo on November 19, 2022, 03:01:04 PMThe project is about the Internet Listing Service,or ILS an online real estate search database, showing properties and units that are for rent or sale.As I usually respond in this sub-board: you'll have to be more explanatory. What, how, why?What's the service you want to setup? Point me the problem you're about to solve with cryptocurrencies and a real estate database.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Quote from: riqo on November 19, 2022, 05:47:10 PMThis will be an innovation for the real estate sector since the seller or investor can keep the house for itself for live or trade or sell it again, even selling shares of it , that will allow anyone invest without having a large amount of money and diversify their portfolio in something solid such as the real estate sector.Can't you already exchange shares of housing? What will be the difference with your service, asides payment made in cryptocurrency?

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: riqo on November 19, 2022, 05:47:10 PMAlso when it comes to making an investment abroad, you have to travel, cross borders, look at the property, do your search and the fact is that with the project that we are going to develop, that problem will be solved thanks to our own company that will be dedicated to publishing the reliability of the property by the client and its review before its publication on the web.We are developing more ideas and new ideas are appreciated!If I understood you correctly, you are trying to do something similar to what RealT is doing for the last few years (and are quite successful at it), right? Or at least you plan to have that as one of the aspects. Gotta say that what you are trying to do is very ambitious and not easy at all so good luck buddy.

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Hello, I am the owner of a software company with 37 programmers. We create desktop, web, mobile apps and different types of websites, we also do design and video animations. We have been dealing with blockchain and cryptocurrencies since 2017. I would be glad if you could give me more information about your project. Feel free to DM us because you haven't allowed "Newbie" accounts to DM you

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: riqo on November 19, 2022, 10:11:49 PMInteresting!! but the difernce is that RealT are only in the USA and as i see there is such a things that i dont like about RealT like that they dont implement btc!Yep, they are focused on US real estate market and from what I know they have no plans of expanding. Second part is true as well, they use tokens based on Ethereum and each house they mint separate tokens. Anyway, I think that it is good for your business that there are already successful projects around doing something similar, meaning there is the interest for it and even maybe a chance to learn from them.

comments.author: Crypto Vira
comments.body: Dude, it is difficult to maintain and make a project in a bad market. I congratulate you for starting such a difficult process

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Hello riqo.I have developed some crypto sites in the past, and if you want i can help you with the project.But i'm curious about how you will manage the payments, the site will receive the payment and then send it to the user? or will be the user who receive the payment direct in his address?This kind of business could be a high risk, because the site owners could walk away with the house money, or the buyer can get scammed with a fake house announcement. And another problem is the taxes, each country have it own laws about this topic, and that makes it complex for this kind of sites.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: riqo on November 19, 2022, 03:01:04 PMAs we know, the digital world is becoming more and more implemented in our lives, payment systems also bitcoin BTC and other altcoins are becoming very popular and the youth are in agreement with it. Therefore I am looking for a team to be able to develop ideas and implement them into reality.Especially people with entrepreneurial visions who are experts in cryptocurrencies and the blockchain, in order to create a solid team and change the world.The project is about the Internet Listing Service,or ILS an online real estate search database, showing properties and units that are for rent or sale.What we could do to improve that system? Implementing just sales,buys and trades via crypto.Thats is just a tinny part for the startup project!If you are a crypto programmer or a cyptomaniac feel free to private message me and join us for this rideRespectfully RiqoGreetings Rigo and welcome to the world of crypto project development!I do not want to sound negative or bring down your mood but before you start looking for people for a project you need to make your pitch convincing. Otherwise why would anyone be interested in joining in this campaign? Imagine yourself in the shoes of the opposite side. Why would you join this project? The first question that would be good to ask yourself is: Why does your project need blockchain or crypto? Can it be done without? What are the use cases? How much funding are you working with? What are your experiences with starting crypto projects?If these questions are hard to answer then you will find that people will not be interested in joining your team.

comments.author: Trasher Travis
comments.body: Hey Riqo,Your idea to implement crypto and blockchain technology on Real Estate listing site is really seems to have good potential, as most business are already adapting crypto into their business.Let me write the overview of this project, based on your requirement.1. Real estate based Listing Service(eg zillow), where user can list their properties with property information and their wish to sell or rent...etc2. The listed properties will be shown to the users in the property list page, here they can choose any.3. The Buyer of the property pays in Crypto (BitCoin Or Ethereum or any, we can either do this with Centralized wallet or decentralized.4. We can also implement escrow service, where the buyers fund will be staked in a smart contract(admin), and will be released to the seller only after the paper works are properly done.5. We can have auto-debit service for rental properties6. We can implement map like GIS (Geographical Information System), where any one around the world can access to the look the properties based on it's geography.7. I think we can make an MVP first and then scale the product with additional ideas to make the business efficient.I'm a fullstack developer, working along with my team,can help you on bringing this project to life, if we have more accurate plan and scope. We are more into crypto based development such as Dapps, DeFi, DAO, NFT, Smart Conract Development...etcYou can check my git here: https://github.com/TrasherTravisIf you wish to discuss further with me if you are interested, please DM TG: Travis_BZ , Discord: Travis#9295 | email: trashertravis@gmail.comThank you!

comments.author: decentrasoft
comments.body: Hi, I've contacted you to the email provided

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: maybe you should clarify your ideas and plans for the future of such a project. I don't think that you are presenting all the details, but for example, the financing of the entire project is a very important thing.those who would participate in the development of such a service, surely want to know how they can benefit from everything. Whether through a later partnership, payment after fundraising or whatever. it's not a bad idea for a business, but in addition to the development of the platform itself, there is still a lot of administrative work and arrangements, and many good ideas got stuck because of the bad setting of the whole plan.
